data.name: Lil Tanks Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Lil Tanks Original Soundtrack is a collection of 20 original MP3 tracks included composed by Kelly Warner.

Track List


1. Level One 3:01
2. Bumrush The Mohave 2:32
3. Bumrush The Mohave Boss 2:34
4. Amazon Definit 2:17
5. Amazon Definit Boss 3:47
6. Volcano Nights 4:47
7. Volcano Chaos 3:05
8. Arctic Main Theme 2:42
9. Cubez 5:38
10. Mystery Theme 3:22
11. Glowing Skies 3:23
12. Victory Vice 1:14
13. Lost and Livid 1:16
14. Upgrades Screen 4:30
15. Gloid 2:31
16. Skillsaw On Ice 3:44
17. U Lava Crew 1:20
18. Wonder Wonder 3:36
19. Endless Mode Madness 10:16
20. End Credits


Please Note - The Lil Tanks Original Soundtrack will be placed in your Lil Tanks folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Lil Tanks\Lil Tanks Original Soundtrack

All tracks created and produced by Kelly Warner

data.short_description: Original Soundtrack for Lil Tanks composed by Kelly Warner. 20 original tracks included.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.4 gHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Nvidia GeForce 8000, ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.4 gHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Nvidia GeForce 8000, ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2 gHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 or equivalent
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

data.legal_notice:
Created & Produced by Kelly Warner
kelly@scorechamber.com
